>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <group delimiter=", ">
      <text variable="title"/>
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <label variable="locator"/>
        <text variable="locator"/>
      </group>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>

        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "type": "book",
